cv.summary_text: Tech-savvy engineer with dual expertise in software development and market finance. Trained at 42 School and the University of Montpellier, with hands-on experience in data science, AI Agents and Software Development. Looking to drive impact as a {job_title} in a fast-paced, innovation-driven team. I am open to relocate.

education.bootcamp_description: Machine learning with Scikit-Learn (supervised/unsupervised), data analysis with Pandas/NumPy, and visualization using Matplotlib/Seaborn. Solid grounding in regression, hypothesis testing, and time series. Completed projects in predictive modeling, segmentation, and decision support.

cover_letter.intro_paragraph: I am writing to express my interest in the {job_title} position at {company_name}. With a strong foundation in software engineering from 42 School and a Master's degree in Finance from the University of Montpellier, combined with professional experience at ENGIE, I am confident I can contribute meaningfully to your team.

With a strong foundation in software engineering from 42 School and a Master's degree in Finance from the University of Montpellier, combined with professional experience at ENGIE, I am confident I can contribute meaningfully to your team.

cover_letter.experience_paragraph: In my role as IS Software Engineer Intern at ENGIE in Madrid, I developed skills across multiple programming languages and frameworks such as Python, Django, C, C++, and full-stack web technologies. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to design RESTful APIs, perform data extraction for critical business processes, and build robust software solutions.

cover_letter.closing_paragraph_1: I am particularly drawn to {company_name} because of {company_excitement}. The opportunity to {specific_goal} aligns directly with my professional goals and expertise. I am eager to discuss how my background and skills can contribute to your team's success.

cover_letter.closing_paragraph_2: Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to speaking with you about how I can contribute to {company_name}.

ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.title: ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform
ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.description: Enterprise moderation SaaS with real-time AI processing. Go backend, Astro frontend, Kafka/Redis architecture. Handles 1000s of posts/sec with intelligent model escalation and concurrent moderator support.

AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.title: AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot
AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.description: Intelligent WhatsApp bot using Meta Cloud API with Flask backend. Features real-time webhook integration, OpenAI Assistant API, secure message handling, and production-ready phone management.

Multi-Model Chat Interface.title: Multi-Model Chat Interface
Multi-Model Chat Interface.description: AI chat system integrating OpenAI, Hugging Face, and DistilBERT models. FastAPI backend with WebSocket support, fine-tuning capabilities, and real-time communication.

Weather Prediction Project.title: Weather Prediction Project
Weather Prediction Project.description: ML system for weather prediction using Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, Ridge Regression, and K-Nearest Neighbors. Interactive web interface with real-time metrics.

AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.title: AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator - CrewAI
AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.description: Developed a CrewAI-based system that analyzes job postings, matches skills, and generates tailored HTML/PDF CVs and cover letters, featuring Streamlit UI and automated document conversion.

AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.title: AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain
AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.description: Developed an AI agent for spreadsheet analysis using LangGraph, featuring secure sandbox execution, multi-step reasoning, and LangSmith for evaluating agents' performance.

MeetingFlowAI.title: MeetingFlowAI
MeetingFlowAI.description: Created an AI-powered automation agent that creates a multi-step workflow: Gmail → OpenAI Processing → Calendar Integration. Features an enhanced UI that highlights the complete program workflow for better user experience.

Recepcia - AI Voice Receptionist.title: Recepcia - AI Voice Receptionist
Recepcia - AI Voice Receptionist.description: B2B SaaS automating appointment scheduling with AI voice assistants via Vapi. Features Twilio/Telynx integration, RAG, secure OAuth calendar sync (Google/Outlook), and N8N automation.

Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.title: Personal Trainer Mobile Platform
Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.description: Built a cross-platform coaching app with an offline-first architecture, secure authentication, subscriptions, and analytics, powered by a FastAPI backend. It was delivered with a high-performance Astro landing page to drive user conversion and onboarding.

education.bootcamp_description: Machine learning with Scikit-Learn (supervised/unsupervised), data analysis with Pandas/NumPy, and visualization using Matplotlib/Seaborn. Solid grounding in regression, hypothesis testing, and time series. Completed projects in predictive modeling, segmentation, and decision support.
education.university_degree: Master's degree in Market Finance - Bachelor of Economics

achievements.collaboration: Collaborated with Back and Middle Office teams to implement tailored software solutions.
achievements.scraping: Scraped data from internal software using Playwright to process business-critical information.
achievements.energy_solutions: Developed Energy Management Solutions: Designed RESTful APIs in Python to optimize powerplant unit-commitment, integrating algorithmic efficiency and robust error handling.
achievements.docker: Dockerized Apps: Built containerized tasks for scalability purpose, deployed on AWS lambdas.

achievements.analytics: Conducted Python data analytics to identify suspicious behaviours in a dataset of 10,000+ records.
achievements.vba_automation: Developed VBA scripts to automate data processing tasks, reducing analysis time by 20%.

achievements.collaboration: Collaboration avec les équipes Back et Middle Office pour la mise en œuvre de solutions logicielles sur mesure.
achievements.scraping: Extraction de données depuis les logiciels internes via Playwright pour traiter des informations métier critiques.
achievements.energy_solutions: Développement de solutions de gestion énergétique : conception d'APIs RESTful en Python pour optimiser l'engagement des unités de production, intégrant efficacité algorithmique et gestion robuste des erreurs.
achievements.docker: Dockerisation d'applications : création de tâches conteneurisées pour la scalabilité, déployées sur AWS Lambda.

achievements.analytics: Analyses de données en Python pour identifier des comportements suspects dans un jeu de données de plus de 10 000 enregistrements.
achievements.vba_automation: Développement de scripts VBA pour automatiser les tâches de traitement de données, réduisant le temps d'analyse de 20%.

ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.title: ModPilot: Plateforme de Modération de Contenu Alimentée par l'IA
ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.description: SaaS de modération d'entreprise avec traitement en temps réel alimenté par l'IA. Backend Go, frontend Astro, architecture Kafka/Redis. Traite des milliers de publications par seconde avec escalade intelligente des modèles et support concurrent des modérateurs.

AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.title: Bot WhatsApp Alimenté par l'IA
AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.description: Bot WhatsApp intelligent avec API Cloud Meta et backend Flask. Webhooks en temps réel, API Assistant OpenAI, gestion sécurisée des messages et gestion des numéros prête pour la production.

Multi-Model Chat Interface.title: Interface de Chat Multi-Modèles
Multi-Model Chat Interface.description: Système de chat IA intégrant les modèles OpenAI, Hugging Face et DistilBERT. Backend FastAPI avec support WebSocket, fine-tuning et communication en temps réel.

Weather Prediction Project.title: Projet de Prédiction Météorologique
Weather Prediction Project.description: Système ML pour prédiction météorologique utilisant Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, Ridge Regression et K-Nearest Neighbors. Interface web interactive avec métriques en temps réel.

AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.title: Générateur d'IA pour CV et Lettre de Motivation - CrewAI
AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.description: Système basé sur CrewAI qui analyse les offres d'emploi, met en correspondance les compétences et génère des CV et lettres de motivation personnalisés en HTML/PDF, avec interface Streamlit et conversion de documents automatisée.

AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.title: Analyseur de Feuille de Calcul IA - LangChain
AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.description: Agent IA pour l'analyse de feuilles de calcul utilisant LangGraph, avec exécution sécurisée dans sandbox, raisonnement multi-étapes et LangSmith pour l'évaluation des performances des agents.

MeetingFlowAI.title: MeetingFlowAI
MeetingFlowAI.description: Agent d'automatisation alimenté par l'IA qui crée un flux de travail multi-étapes : Gmail → Traitement OpenAI → Intégration Calendrier. Interface améliorée qui met en évidence le flux de travail du programme complet pour une meilleure expérience utilisateur.

Recepcia - Réceptionniste Vocale IA.title: Recepcia - Réceptionniste Vocale IA
Recepcia - Réceptionniste Vocale IA.description: SaaS B2B automatisant la planification des rendez-vous avec assistants vocaux IA via Vapi. Intégrations Twilio/Telynx, RAG, synchronisation sécurisée des calendriers OAuth (Google/Outlook) et automatisation N8N.

Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.title: Plateforme Mobile d'Entraîneur Personnel
Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.description: Application de coaching multi-plateforme avec architecture offline-first, authentification sécurisée, abonnements et analytique, alimentée par un backend FastAPI. Livraison avec une landing page Astro haute performance pour augmenter la conversion et l'intégration des utilisateurs.

ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.title: ModPilot: Plataforma de Moderación de Contenido Impulsada por IA
ModPilot: AI Content Moderation Platform.description: SaaS de moderación empresarial con procesamiento en tiempo real impulsado por IA. Backend Go, frontend Astro, arquitectura Kafka/Redis. Maneja miles de publicaciones por segundo con escalada inteligente de modelos y soporte concurrente de moderadores.

AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.title: Bot de WhatsApp Impulsado por IA
AI-Powered WhatsApp Bot.description: Bot inteligente de WhatsApp con API Cloud de Meta y backend Flask. Webhooks en tiempo real, API de Asistente OpenAI, manejo seguro de mensajes y gestión lista para producción.

Multi-Model Chat Interface.title: Interfaz de Chat Multi-Modelo
Multi-Model Chat Interface.description: Sistema de chat IA que integra modelos de OpenAI, Hugging Face y DistilBERT. Backend FastAPI con soporte WebSocket, fine-tuning y comunicación en tiempo real.

Weather Prediction Project.title: Proyecto de Predicción del Clima
Weather Prediction Project.description: Sistema ML para predicción meteorológica usando Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, Ridge Regression y K-Nearest Neighbors. Interfaz web interactiva con métricas en tiempo real.

AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.title: Generador de CV y Carta de Presentación Impulsado por IA - CrewAI
AI-Powered CV & Cover Letter Generator -.description: Sistema basado en CrewAI que analiza ofertas de trabajo, hace coincidir habilidades y genera CV y cartas de presentación personalizadas en HTML/PDF, con interfaz Streamlit y conversión de documentos automatizada.

AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.title: Analista de Hojas de Cálculo de IA - LangChain
AI Spreadsheet Analyst - LangChain.description: Agente de IA para análisis de hojas de cálculo utilizando LangGraph, con ejecución segura en sandbox, razonamiento multi-paso y LangSmith para evaluar el rendimiento de los agentes.

MeetingFlowAI.title: MeetingFlowAI
MeetingFlowAI.description: Agente de automatización impulsado por IA que crea un flujo de trabajo multi-paso: Gmail → Procesamiento OpenAI → Integración de Calendario. Interfaz mejorada que destaca el flujo de trabajo del programa completo para una mejor experiencia del usuario.

Recepcia - Recepcionista de Voz de IA.title: Recepcia - Recepcionista de Voz de IA
Recepcia - Recepcionista de Voz de IA.description: SaaS B2B automatizando programación de citas con asistentes de voz IA vía Vapi. Integraciones Twilio/Telynx, RAG, sincronización segura de calendarios OAuth (Google/Outlook) y automatización N8N.

Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.title: Plataforma Móvil de Entrenador Personal
Personal Trainer Mobile Platform.description: Aplicación de coaching multiplataforma con arquitectura offline-first, autenticación segura, suscripciones y analítica, impulsada por un backend FastAPI. Entregado con una página de inicio Astro de alto rendimiento para impulsar la conversión e integración de usuarios.
